com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.interfaces.IController

Uses of IController in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.entity.controller
 

Classes in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.entity.controller that implement IController
 class CharacterController
          CharacterController extends Controller to define the base type controller that controls a SnowmanEntity.
 class SnowballController
          SnowballController extends Controller to define the controlling unit that is responsible for controlling the movement of a SnowballEntity.
 class SnowmanController
          SnowmanController extends Controller and implements MouseInputListener to define the input handling unit that is responsible for mapping user inputs to ITask which performs modifications on the SnowmanEntity.
 

Uses of IController in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input
 

Classes in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input that implement IController
 class Controller
          Controller implements IController to define the basic abstraction of an entity controller.
 

Uses of IController in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input.util
 

Methods in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input.util that return IController
 IController InputManager.getController(com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.common.interfaces.IDynamicEntity entity)
          Retrieve the entity controller with given enumeration.
 

Methods in com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input.util with parameters of type IController
 boolean InputManager.registerController(IController controller)
          Register the given entity controller to the appropriate input device.
